愛でたし愛でたし: (めでたしめでたし) - and they all lived happily ever after (traditional ending to stories)
愛に飢える: (あいにうえる) - to hunger for love; to starve for love
愛の神: (あいのかみ) - Amor; Eros; Venus; god of love
愛の結晶: (あいのけっしょう) - fruit of love; children
愛らしい: (あいらしい) - pretty; charming; lovely; adorable
愛人関係: (あいじんかんけい) - being lovers
愛別離苦: (あいべつりく) - (yoji)  the pain of separation from loved ones
愛吟: (あいぎん) - favourite poem or song/favorite poem or song; lover of poetry and song
愛唱曲: (あいしょうきょく) - favourite song; favorite song
愛唱歌: (あいしょうか) - (one's) favourite song; (one's) favorite song
愛器: (あいき) - favourite musical instrument, utensil, etc.
愛国: (あいこく) - love of (one's) country; patriotism
愛国団体: (あいこくだんたい) - patriotic group or organization (organisation)
愛国心: (あいこくしん) - patriotic feelings; patriotism
愛国歌: (あいこくか) - Aegukga/national anthem of South Korea; Aegukka/national anthem of North Korea/The Patriotic Song/Let Morning Shine; The Patriotic Song/national anthem of the Russian SFSR and of the Russian Federation from 1990 to 2000
愛国運動: (あいこくうんどう) - patriotic movement
愛好会: (あいこうかい) - club (esp. for devotees or fanciers of some subject or activity)
愛好家: (あいこうか) - (esp. 〜（の）愛好家) amateur; fancier; lover; worshipper; enthusiast; fan
愛好者: (あいこうしゃ) - enthusiast; fan; devotee; one who loves something
愛妓: (あいぎ) - favored geisha; beloved geisha; geisha somebody is showing favor to
愛妻弁当: (あいさいべんとう) - lunchbox made with loving care by one's wife
愛妾: (あいしょう) - beloved concubine; favourite concubine (e.g. of the shogun)
愛婿: (あいせい) - one's favorite son-in-law; one's favourite son-in-law
愛嬌: (あいきょう) - charm/attractiveness/amiability/winsomeness; courtesy/ingratiating behaviour; (usu. as 御愛嬌)  entertainment/amusement/fun
愛嬌を振りまく: (あいきょうをふりまく) - (common error is 愛想を振りまく) to make oneself pleasant to everybody; to smile at everybody; to try to please everybody; to make things pleasant
愛嬌を振り撒く: (あいきょうをふりまく) - (common error is 愛想を振りまく) to make oneself pleasant to everybody; to smile at everybody; to try to please everybody; to make things pleasant
愛嬌付く: (あいきょうづく) - to become lovely; to become charming; to become sweet (facial features, etc)
愛嬌商売: (あいきょうしょうばい) - occupation where charm is necessary to succeed
愛嬌笑い: (あいきょうわらい) - insincere laugh; insincere smile; ingratiating smile
愛嬌者: (あいきょうもの) - pleasant person; attractive person; animal liked by all because of its cuteness
愛嬌黒子: (あいきょうぼくろ) - beauty spot
愛弟子: (まなでし) - favorite pupil; favourite pupil; teacher's pet
愛念: (あいねん) - affection; strong feeling of love
愛恤: (あいじゅつ) - helping somebody out of pity
愛息: (あいそく) - (your) beloved son; cute boy
愛情を傾ける: (あいじょうをかたむける) - to fix one's affection on
愛情深い: (あいじょうふかい) - loving; caring; devoted
愛情表現: (あいじょうひょうげん) - expression of love; showing love
愛惜: (あいじゃく) - missing someone; loathing to part
愛想: (あいそう) - civility; courtesy; compliments; sociability; graces
愛想がつきる: (あいそがつきる) - to be disgusted with; to be fed up with; to run out of patience with
愛想が尽きる: (あいそがつきる) - to be disgusted with; to be fed up with; to run out of patience with
愛想のいい: (あいそのいい) - (adj-ix) affable; amiable; sociable; agreeable
愛想のよい: (あいそのよい) - affable; amiable; sociable; agreeable
愛想の良い: (あいそのよい) - affable; amiable; sociable; agreeable
愛想もこそも尽き果てる: (あいそもこそもつきはてる) - to be completely disgusted with; to be absolutely fed up with; to run out of patience with
愛想も小想も尽き果てる: (あいそもこそもつきはてる) - to be completely disgusted with; to be absolutely fed up with; to run out of patience with
愛想よく: (あいそよく) - engagingly; cordially; amiably; sociably; hospitably
愛想を尽かす: (あいそをつかす) - to be disgusted with; to run out of patience; to fall out of love
愛想を振りまく: (あいそをふりまく) - (common error for 愛嬌を振りまく)  to make oneself pleasant to everybody
愛想を振り撒く: (あいそをふりまく) - (common error for 愛嬌を振りまく)  to make oneself pleasant to everybody
愛想尽かし: (あいそづかし) - no longer being fond of someone; spiteful words or acts showing that one is disgusted with someone
愛想笑い: (あいそうわらい) - insincere smile; ingratiating smile; forced smile
愛想良く: (あいそよく) - engagingly; cordially; amiably; sociably; hospitably
愛愛しい: (あいあいしい) - lovely; charming; sociable
愛慾: (あいよく) - passion/sexual desire/lust; attachment (esp. to one's family or a member of the opposite sex)
愛憎: (あいぞう) - love and hate; likes and dislikes
愛敬: (あいきょう) - charm/attractiveness/amiability/winsomeness; courtesy/ingratiating behaviour; (usu. as 御愛嬌)  entertainment/amusement/fun
愛敬のある: (あいきょうのある) - charming; attractive
愛敬の餅: (あいきょうのもちい) - Heian-period ceremony where a newlywed groom and bride eat a rice-cake on the third night after the wedding ceremony
愛敬らしい: (あいきょうらしい) - lovely; sweet
愛敬付く: (あいぎょうづく) - to have a charming face, voice, personality, etc.; to be charming
愛敬毛: (あいきょうげ) - straggling hair; hair too short to be tied or arranged with the rest of the hair (typically around the sideburns); lovelock
愛敬紅: (あいきょうべに) - lipstick that actors put on their earlobes, cheeks and corners of eyes; lipstick discreetly put on the earlobes or the corners of the eyes (by women)
愛敬者: (あいきょうもの) - pleasant person; attractive person; animal liked by all because of its cuteness
愛敬黒子: (あいきょうぼくろ) - beauty spot
愛日: (あいじつ) - winter daylight/winter sunlight; trying to make the most of each day/devoting oneself to one's parents
愛書: (あいしょ) - great love of books; favorite book (favourite)
愛染: (あいぜん) - being drawn to something one loves/amorous passion; Ragaraja (esoteric school deity of love)
